ms_copies_parts: Naples, Conservatorio, 22.5.6, 'Quartetto no. 2... per uso di S. E. Abate Don Antonio Giorgio'
sources.first_edition: December, 1769, Paris, Vénier: Op. 6 no. 2 (for title, see No. 165)
later_editions: (c. 1770), London, Longman Lukey and Co. (Op. 4), no. 1 of Six quartettos for two violins, tenor and violoncello obligato, composed by Sigr Luigi Boccherini opera IV. Prix 8. London. Printed and sold by Longman Lukey and Co. N° 26 Cheapside where may be had [...] Boccherini Jesiuis for the Harpd. 1696

(c. 1775), London, Bremner (Op. 6), no. 1 of Six quartettos for two violins tenor and violoncello obligato composed by Sigr. Luigi Boccherini Opera VI Pr. 10/6. London. Printed and sold by R. Bremner, opposite Somerset House Strand. The frontispiece is identical with that of the Longman edition

(c. 1780), Amsterdam, Hummel (Op. 2), no. 1 of Six quatuor à deux violons, taille e basse obligés dédiés à Monsieur Patrick Alströmer, conseiller du commerce de Sa Majesté le Roi de Suède par Jean-Julien Hummel composés par Luigi Boccherini opera seconda. A Amsterdam, chez. J. J. Hummel, marchand et imprimeur de musique. Prix Fl. 5. Plate no. 107
(c. 1785?), Paris, Boyer-Naderman: Op. 6 no. 2 (for title, see No. 165)
sources.modern_edition: 1953, Milan, Ricordi: Op. 6 no. 2 (pocket score; revised by Enrico Polo)

partial_notes: This page shows the continuation of G. 166 string quartet sources and publication history.
